title: Birmingham, Alabama.  Dr. Martin Luther King Jr., just before he spoke at the funeral of the four girls murdered in the 16th Street Baptist Church.
marks: \"#16\", in pencil, on back; \"Printer/Kelton/BLEAK B \"Danny Lyon\", in pencil, on back
description: somber-faced portrait of Martin Luther King
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
